summary: 开发大模型API接口开发思路 第一步、调用开源模型 开源大模型 from transformers import AutoModelForCausalLM, AutoTokenizer from transformers.generation import GenerationConfig model_path = os.path.join(current_path, "models/Qwen-7B-Chat") # Model names: "Qwen/Qwen-7B-Chat", "Qwen/Qwen-14B-Chat" tokenizer = AutoTokenizer.from_pretrained(model_path, trust_remote_code=True) # use bf16 # model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained(model_path, device_map="auto", trust_remote_code=True, bf16=True).eval() # use fp16 # model = AutoModelForCausalLM.from_pretrained(model_path, device_map="auto", trust_remote_code=True,
title: 大模型接口

summary:
About Me Career Path In my first year, I worked as a big data team in a cybersecurity company and learned about the Hadoop big data ecosystem components, including Spark and Hive
In the second year, I worked at a big data company and systematically learned about the development and maintenance of HIVE databases, as well as machine learning modeling for text structuring in the field of natural language,
In my third year, I worked at a software development company and successfully transformed into a natural language processing development engineer, mainly engaged in the research and development of dialogue robot engines
